courseDescription:
Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are pieces of digital art or collections backed by blockchain technology with unique identification codes that you cannot replicate. This course will teach you how to create your own NFTs, mint them and profit from them in the crypto market. You will also understand how blockchain technology works to power cryptocurrencies. If you are intrigued by NFTs, blockchain and the Web 3.0, then this course is for you.

A crypto wallet, ‘hot’ or ‘cold’, is accessed through a password and some key phrases. You will discover ways to save or store these key phrases and differentiate between the public and private keys. ERC 20 and ERC 721 are the standards that dictate the rules and actions you must follow on the blockchain. We will expansively review these protocols. Also, you will learn about smart contracts and how to navigate exchanges and connect your account to your NFTs' ‘hot’ wallet.

Whether you are an expert or a novice, you need to be careful when making transactions in the crypto market. First, you will be given five tips and tricks on NFTs to guide you through your crypto journey. Then, you will learn how to create awareness for your NFTs using social media. This course is brought to you by Manas Roy, an author, online instructor, digital marketer and voice-over artist. He has taught over 60 000 students globally and is now spreading the wisdom of cryptos, NFTs and blockchain. Even if you are entirely new to the crypto NFT market, this course will take you from a beginner level to an expert. Sign up now!
